thread.title: Drew Maru

author: Drew Maru
title: Drew Maru
text: I had never been one for budget airlines or cheap tickets so at first I was skeptic of the site. However, after using it once and discovering that it was the same flights that I had always been purchasing at escalated prices, I have not looked back since. Especially for someone that doesn't plan months ahead, this site is a gem to look for affordable flights closer to your time of departure so you don't pay exuberant fees for the exact same seat. Thanks
